issues.description: The problem statement specifies orderMeal should return void (UML: +orderMeal(Meal): void and text), but the solution implementation declares orderMeal as returning boolean. This return type mismatch can confuse students about the correct method signature and lead to compile errors.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the return type of orderMeal in the solution to void to match the specification, or update the problem statement to specify a boolean return if success/failure feedback is intended.
